attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to the public
attributes.additional_details: Misuse of fireworks by the public has escalated dramatically. In my locality it is not unusual to be woken multiple times of night by firework displays after the legal cut off of 11pm, sometimes at late as 2am. This is a public nuisance. The misuse of fireworks is tough to police and so the problem must be fought at the source. Drug gangs use fireworks as a means of marking their territory. Fireworks upset children and animals and are physically dangerous if mishandled.
attributes.background: Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public. Change the law to make fireworks only available to those with a licence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
